page.title: 19Recreation:
page.content: Langwathby has Scout,cub and Brownie packs.Fund raising activities enabled the scouts to open their own hut.The youth club runs many outings and has bought a mini bus which is used by other groups.They go swimming & roller skating and have tennis and hockey matches.The Cricket and Football Club built their own pavilion with support from local firms.The club offers the field to Edenhall for their Sports Day started in 1945.The villages join to- gether for W.I.and they meet in their own hut.Retired people meet in the reading room & run trips to places of interest.A Young Wives' Group has talks in the winter & rounders in the summer.The Fellowship Group have demon strations & discussions.The Vicar's wife has keep fit and dancing classes. The Youth Guild has meetings.Extras: Tennis court,swings and roundabout.
